name: Grotto
description: A small grotto provides intimate shelter and often contains natural springs or unique formations, but the limited space restricts group size. The secluded nature makes it perfect for secret meetings or meditation, while the natural beauty can have magical properties.
atmosphere: Small, intimate cave creating privacy and seclusion. Cool air scented of earth, stone, and natural springs. Limited space creates intimacy and special, hidden place feeling. Perfect for secret meetings or meditation. Natural beauty and unique formations create wonder and potential magical properties.
